ajeffrey.teaching.size.event

Interface SizeResponseHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SizeResponseMultiplexer, SizeResponseSerializer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SizeResponseParser

    public interface SizeResponseHandler
    An event handler for a SIZE response (either FOUND, NOT FOUND, or OK).
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Alan Jeffrey
